entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: 4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 59 %
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 before morning. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:12 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:12 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow beginning before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:12 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
